Html:
Hello every one

              I want to create a xls file with multiple sheets and data with different fonts and styles. Please some one guide hand help me. And if there is a sample code please provide me that.
If you download PHPExcel 1.7.0 release, you will find a folder name Tests. Try to run 05featuredemo.php, it shows the features you are asking for.
Thanks a lot. I found lot of information there , and with that able to create my desire file
